com.twitter.heron.resource

Class UnitTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.resource.UnitTestHelper

  • public final class UnitTestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper used for unit test, it provides following util methods: 1. Get a mock physical plan 2. Clear the singleton registry by using reflection 3. Get a RegisterInstanceResponse, used by a mock stream manager to send back to instance when it receives a RegisterInstanceRequest

    • Method Detail

      • getPhysicalPlan

        public static PhysicalPlans.PhysicalPlan getPhysicalPlan(boolean ackEnabled,
                                                         int messageTimeout,
                                                         TopologyAPI.TopologyState topologyState)
        Construct a physical plan with basic setting.
        Parameters:
        ackEnabled - whether the acking system is enabled
        messageTimeout - the seconds for a tuple to be time-out. -1 means the timeout is not enabled.
        topologyState - the Topology State inside this PhysicaPlan, for intance, RUNNING.
        Returns:
        the corresponding Physical Plan
